casebody.data:
Mellen v. Banning. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. March 31, 1892.) Action by Sarah E. Mellen against William 0. Banning, as executor, etc., and others.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and O’Brien and Ingraham, JJ.

No opinion. It would seem that the proper cause would be to review the decision of the general term by an appeal from the judgment entered after a trial.

Por report of other litigation involving this estate, see 9 N. Y. Supp. 929; 14 N. Y. Supp. 665; 16 N. Y. Supp. 191, 887; 17 N. Y. Supp. 866; 18 N. Y. Supp. 515.
